tutorials.title: Getting Started
tutorials.description: This is the prerequisites for customers using Free Trial and Paid tenancies, and Always Free accounts (if applicable). The title of the lab and the Contents Menu title (the title above) match for Prerequisite lab. This lab is always first.

tutorials.title: Lab 2: Connect to ODI
tutorials.description: Connect to ODI using VNC Viewer

tutorials.title: Lab 3: Connect to ODI Repository and Prepare Source
tutorials.description: Create and connect to work repository and prepare data source

tutorials.title: Lab 4: Configure and Run ODI Integration
